body.name: 17.8Lbs Portable Washing Machine Nictemaw Portable Washer, 2.3 Cu.ft Washer and Dryer Combo with Drain Pump, 10 Programs 8 Water Level Compact Laundry Washer for Home, Apartment, RV, Dorms
body.stockDetail: Only 19 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【2-In-1 Full Automatic Washer & Spin Dryer Combo】--- Designed with a Full-Automatic System, Equipped with a single cylinder & drain pump, the washing machine not only can be used to wash your clothes but also for drying them. And washing and dehydration can be used separately. You only need to set the washing/spinning program, and then it can work alone. The washing machine is equipped with an extended drain pipe and a drain pump to help your washing machine drain water easily and quickly.

【Multi-Function Control Panel】--- There are 10 programs on the control panel, 8 water level selections and timer on the LED display. All functions and operations are clearly listed, including water level/rotation, program/delay, time setting and child lock. It also includes detergent and program options to meet your needs for selecting the appropriate programs and water level according to different cloth.Equipped with a faucet adapter to meet the needs of the faucet interface.

【Compact Design & Large Load Capacity】--- Comes with spacious capacity, powerful motor and drain pump, this washer machine is compact and lightweight for you to easily move it in your home. No installation and easy operation.The transparent lid allows you to view and monitor the water and washing conditions.The honeycomb shaped inner tub can load 17.8lbs at one time and wash many clothes for you. Suitable for dorms, apartment, condos, RV's, camping and more.

【Automatic Imbalance Adjustment and Adjustable Foot】--- While spinning, if the laundries inside the tub are not put equally, it would cause violent vibration. At this time, Nictemaw portable washing machine’s imbalance adjustment function will start automatically to adjust the imbalance situation if vibration is beyond certain level. Bottom feet can be adjusted to meet your needs.

【Extremely Energy Saving】---With different levels of water control: L/16L M/23L H/30L. Adjust the different washing mode and water level through the wash push-button. This portable washing machine has a 24 hour smart delay cleaning function. You can preset the washing start time according to your needs. Equiped with high quality and durable motor, providing stable power. Saving as much 84% energy consumption comparing to similar model. Washing machine is able to save money for your household.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Large Capacity Wash & Spin Dry Fast & Clean Previous page Next page PLEASE NOTE--All products are fully inspected, and maybe some water stains will remain, please rest assured to use. All products are brand new.

Detail Features of Washing Machine SMART CONTROL PANEL This washing machine is very easy to operate via its touch control panel. Heavy, Soft, Normal, Rapid and Soak programs, you are allowed to quickly start the machine as you need. You can customize washing program by selecting load size, adding additional wash time, rinse time and spin time as well. BUILT-IN DRAIN PUMP The washing machine is equipped with an extended drain pipe and a drain pump to help your washing machine drain water easily and quickly. If the faucet does not match the inlet hose, you can use the adapter included in the accessories. With this washing machine, you will find washing is an easy job.

Child Lock Function Don’t worry about the child accidentally touch the washing machine. Protect the child touch the machine, bring more safety to your family! Auto Unbalance Detection With automatic unbalance detection which can correct imbalance automatically and avoid vibration if the clothes is not distributed equally. Low Energy Consumption The latest technology motor works with extremely low noise and high power to ensure the best cleaning performance. The energy consumption is very low. 24 Hours Smart Delay Function With 24 hour delay function. You can choose the desired start time by pressing the program button, and it is flexible to arrange your own time.

LATEST UPGRADE VERSION Portable Washing Machine Is A Good Choice for Your Laundry! Equipped with drain pump and extended drain pipe. The max weight capacity of this washing machine reaches 17.8lbs, which is very suitable for you to do medium weight laundry. Equipped with a variety of convenience features, our washing machine includes a see-through lid, smart controls with LED display, stainless steel inner tub and 2 water pipes. With this laundry washing machine, you will find that washing clean and fast is an easy job.
This Washing Machine is a Perfect Solution to Doing Laundry! Previous page Next page

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Work perfect . Satisfies all me expectations
reviews.reviewText: It’s almost 1 month how I use this washer machine. Very comfortable in use. Super easy to install it. Cloth is clean and dry fast after. Don’t take too much space which is good for my small apartment. Don’t make too much noise and not hard vibrating. So not bothering my neighbors. And you can put more cloth for one circle of wash then it’s looks. Don’t affect my electric bill. And it’s good bonus . Do I recommend it to my friends already . It’s super good washer for small living spaces . For me it’s work super well and super affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great washing machine!
reviews.reviewText: As an avid RV enthusiast, I cannot contain my excitement to share my experience with the incredible mini washing machine that has revolutionized my life on the road! Let me tell you why this portable gem has become an absolute essential in my RV journey.First and foremost, the compact size of this mini washing machine is an absolute game-changer. It fits perfectly into the limited space of my RV, effortlessly sliding into any corner or tucked away under a cabinet when not in use. No more worrying about hauling dirty laundry to laundromats or relying on handwashing, this mini washer brings convenience right to my doorstep.Despite its small size, this mighty machine packs a powerful punch! Its surprisingly spacious drum capacity allows me to wash an impressive amount of clothes in a single load, cutting down on laundry time significantly. I was genuinely amazed at how efficiently it cleans my clothes, leaving them fresh and spotless every time.What truly sets this mini washing machine apart is its energy efficiency. Being on the road means being mindful of resources, and this washer helps me conserve both water and electricity. It uses minimal water for each cycle, making it eco-friendly and perfect for extended stays in nature.Moreover, the machine's low power consumption ensures that my RV's battery isn't drained excessively during usage. This means I can do my laundry without worrying about the impact on my overall power supply – a crucial consideration for anyone living the RV lifestyle.Not only is this mini washing machine a time and energy saver, but it also boasts an array of impressive features. The intuitive control panel makes selecting the right wash cycle a breeze, with options to customize settings based on fabric type and soil level. It even has a quick wash function for those times when I need clean clothes in a hurry.I also appreciate the thoughtful design of the machine, which minimizes vibration and noise during operation. Laundry day no longer means disturbing the tranquility of my RV space or bothering my neighbors at the campsite – a true blessing!As for durability, this mini washing machine has proven itself to be a tough companion. It's built to withstand the rigors of the road, and I've taken it on numerous adventures without a hint of malfunction or wear.In conclusion, if you're an RV enthusiast like me and value convenience, efficiency, and sustainability, investing in this mini washing machine is an absolute no-brainer. It has become an indispensable part of my RV life, saving me time, energy, and resources while ensuring I always have clean clothes on hand. Say goodbye to the hassle of laundry day and embrace the freedom and ease that this mini washing machine brings to your RV adventures. Happy washing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolute Life Saver
reviews.reviewText: This washer is absoutly amazing. I live in an apt where laundry is downstairs and with my health issues makes it nearly impossible to safely take laundry down and back up and my partner doesn't have to time to do laundry either due to work. So getting this washer for the apt has been an absolute life saver! It's so easy to use and fits a good amount of clothes! It's easy to hook up and them move back to wear you want to store it when your done with laundry. It's spins the cloths super well so light clothes only take a couple hours where as some heavier stuff take a day or so to dry. Example my jeans only took a day to dry I expected longer than that but I am so happy with this washer. If your looking to get one this is the way to go!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2022
reviews.reviewText: As a perpetually single, 35 year old man with a bad habit of moving all over the country every couple of years, I have never seen a reason to buy a full sized washer. When my trust Magic Chef portable washer have it on me after 4 years, I was looking for a reasonably priced alternative to a full size unit. This one advertised a .2 cu ft lower capacity for a reasonable price, so I thought I would try it out. I am now regretting that decision.The first thing I noticed was the size is significantly smaller. The advertised space is about 90% of my old washer, but I struggle to fit a weeks worth of shirts in it, while I never had a problem with my old machine. I have concerns about what would happen if I tried to put a comforter in this one.The second thing I noticed was the smell. It gives off a very industrial smell whenever I use it. I hope that this will go away in time, and I haven't noticed this small on my clothes, but it makes my laundry room stink whenever I use it.The last big thing I have noticed is the spin cycle is so weak, it is almost useless. I have taken things out, and they are still dripping wet. So wet that I can wring them out with little effort. I was accustomed to my old machine, where things came out very dry. At the end, on that machine, the spin cycle stopped working, and things came out of it only a little wetter then they come out of this one. You can see how much water is left after a normal cycle in the picture. It is a little hard to see, but there is about a a cup of water in the drum on the right. Edit 10/12/2022 I was able to solve this problem by putting the machine on top of a rack. Apparently the water drainage pump is not strong enough to lift the drain water to a standard laundry hookup height, so putting it on the rack has solved that problem. Clothes still come out wetter then I would like, but better. This is a fatal flaw in my opinion, considering I had to spend an additional $80 for a sturdy enough rack on which to put this. I really wish I had spent that extra $80 on a better machine. Dropping a three star rating to a one star.Ultimately, in another year or so I will hopefully be moving overseas for work, so this will do until then. But I will be glad to turn my back on it when that time comes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Choice Great Price
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely great machine has held up to some tuff usage. I appreciate that it’s light enough to be movable around my apartment. It effectively washes my clothes. The only complaint I had was the drain pump seemed to become really loud after about a month of having it, I put a washer cleaner tablet in which seemed to quiet it down but not as quiet as it was new. More clarity on where we can purchase such items and I would change to a 5 stars
